value.title: Do we have enough GPUs to manifest AI’s potential?
value.excerpt: The GPU shortage presents both challenge and opportunity as enterprises adapt and become more innovative, agile and responsive in the process.

value.title: Elsa Introduces NVIDIA A800 40GB Active GPU with HBM2 Memory
value.excerpt: Elsa has initiated the distribution of the "NVIDIA A800 40GB Active" AI GPU card, model EQRA800-40GER, boasting 40GB of HBM2 memory. The NVIDIA A800 40GB Active is powered by the NVIDIA Ampere ...

value.title: Processor made for AI speeds up genome assembly
value.excerpt: A hardware accelerator initially developed for artificial intelligence operations successfully speeds up the alignment of protein and DNA molecules, making the process up to 10 times faster than state-of-the-art methods.

value.title: AMD Rises as AI Chip Sales Prediction Bodes Well for Rivalry With Nvidia
value.excerpt: CEO Lisa Su on Tuesday provided a 2024 sales forecast for the first time for the MI300 chips, designed to compete against the advanced H100 chips sold by Nvidia. She projected annual sales of more than $2 billion, and raised the chip's current-quarter revenue expectations by $100 million.

value.title: AMD slides as muted outlook clouds Q3 earnings beat with AI chip launch in focus
value.excerpt: AMD said its new data center chips, expected to challenge Nvidia's AI market dominance, could net more than $2 billion in sales next year.

value.title: AWS offers more flexible access to Nvidia GPUs for short-duration AI workloads
value.excerpt: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) Capacity Blocks for ML is generally available now, and allows customers to reserve access to “hundreds” of Nvidia Corp.’s most advanced H100 Tensor Core GPUs colocated in Amazon EC2 UltraClusters that are geared towards high-performance machine learning workloads.

value.title: AMD’s stock claws back initial losses as it forecasts $2B in AI chip sales in 2024
value.excerpt: The company’s stock, which gained 2% during the regular session, fell by more than 5% after-hours in the wake of its third-quarter earnings report. But after AMD executives gave an upbeat assessment of the company’s progress and prospects in AI, those losses were quickly clawed back.

value.title: Intel beats NVIDIA in GPU business: South Korea's 'Google' buys Intel CPUs for AI workloads
value.excerpt: South Korea's 'Google', Naver, is switching over to using CPUs for some of its AI workloads away from GPUs, because of supply chain + high prices.

value.title: NVIDIA's next-gen B100 'Blackwell' AI GPUs hit supply chain certification stage
value.excerpt: NVIDIA's next-gen Blackwell B100 AI GPUs have entered the supply chain certification stage, with NVIDIA working with supply chain partners now.

value.title: Media Alert: BrainChip Hosts 'Sustainable Cities Using Smart Efficient AI' Workshop at Hackster.io Impact Summit 2023
value.excerpt: Todd Vierra, Vice President Customer Engagement at BrainChip Holdings Ltd (ASX: BRN, OTCQX: BRCHF, ADR: BCHPY), the world's first commercial producer of ultra-low power, fully digital, event-based, neuromorphic AI IP, will lead a workshop entitled "Sustainable Cities Using Smart Efficient AI" at the Hackster.io Impact Summit 2023 November 15.

value.title: ZeroRISC raises $5M to deliver commercial OpenTitan-based cloud security for chips
value.excerpt: ZeroRISC has raised $5 million in seed funding to deliver its first commercial OpenTitan-based cloud security service for silicon chips.

value.title: Intel Is Counting On AI Inference To Save The Xeon CPU
value.excerpt: There is little question that generative AI as well as other kinds of machine learning are going to augment applications in every industry and in every part of the application stack in the coming years.

value.title: Crypto billionaire's nonprofit buys $500 million of AI data center chips
value.excerpt: A nonprofit organization funded by cryptocurrency billionaire Jed McCaleb bought roughly $500 million of Nvidia advanced chips and plans to lease computing capacity to companies for artificial intelligence projects.

value.title: Is NVIDIA a Good Buy After the White House AI Chip Sale Ban?
value.excerpt: The stock slipped 5% in response. In today’s Market 360, we’ll take a closer look at the new AI chip regulations and how they’ll impact NVIDIA. And then, I’ll share if NVIDIA is a buy following its recent weakness or a stock to avoid. Here’s what ...

value.title: Entering AI era, Taiwan chip industry urges renewables push
value.excerpt: Taiwan's chip industry is ready to work with the government to achieve its 2050 net-zero goal but development of renewable energy sources needs to be hastened as demand for artificial intelligence booms,

value.title: Generative AI is Coming to Robots, Courtesy of NVIDIA
value.excerpt: As generative AI continues to revolutionize text and natural language processing, it’s also impacting computer vision. This transformative technology is expected to bring advancements in autonomous machines and robotics, where cameras play a pivotal role.

value.title: Exploring the details of an energy-saving AI chip
value.excerpt: Hussam Amrouch has developed an AI-ready architecture that is twice as powerful as comparable in-memory computing approaches. As reported in the journal Nature Communications, the professor at the Technical University of Munich (TUM) applies a new computational paradigm using special circuits known as ferroelectric field effect transistors (FeFETs).

value.title: SK hynix cuts losses in Q3 on higher AI memory chip sales
value.excerpt: SK hynix posted an operating loss of 1.79 trillion won ($1.31 billion) in the third quarter, but the memory chip maker was able to reduce its deficit by focusing on high-priced and high-performance AI memory chips such as high-bandwidth memory (HBM),

value.title: AMD and Korean telco KT back AI software developer Moreh in $22M Series B
value.excerpt: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) and Korean telco KT are among the investors of Moreh, which builds an AI software tool that optimizes and creates AI models.

value.title: How AI And Blockchain Are Fighting Counterfeiting In The Luxury Market
value.excerpt: AI is only ever as good as the information fed to its algorithm ... they are linked to the physical item in question by an attached near field communication chip (NFC) in the case of Margiela accessories like the brand’s Tabi shoes or quick response ...

value.title: StackPath Launches GPU-Accelerated Edge Compute Instances
value.excerpt: DALLAS, Oct. 25, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- StackPath, the industry-leading edge computing platform, today announced the addition of NVIDIA GPU-Accelerated Instances to its Virtual Machine (VM) and Container product options.

value.title: US Government Orders Immediate Stop to Chinese AI Chip Exports
value.excerpt: Tech giant Nvidia has announced that President Biden’s administration has ordered it to stop shipping advanced AI chips to China immediately. These restrictions were always in the works and due to start next month. However, for an as-of-yet unknown reason, this date has been brought forward to today.

value.title: CentML lands $27M from Nvidia, others to make AI models run more efficiently
value.excerpt: CentML, a startup building tools to enable AI models to run more efficiently on existing hardware, has raised $27 million in a venture funding round.

value.title: US orders immediate halt to some AI chip exports to China, Nvidia says
value.excerpt: Tech giant Nvidia says the US has told it to stop shipping some of its advanced artificial intelligence chips to China immediately. The restrictions were supposed to be introduced 30 days from 17 October.

value.title: AI Dominates Qualcomm Snapdragon Summit With New Snapdragon Products
value.excerpt: Principal Analyst, Mobility & VR, Anshel Sag analyzes the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and Snapdragon X Elite SoCs and predicts their impact on AI-driven mobile devices and PCs.

value.title: CoreWeave Chooses DDN Storage to Power Accelerated Computing and AI in the Cloud
value.excerpt: DDN Storage Accelerates Generative AI and Large Language Models with CoreWeave's GPU Cloud and NVIDIA AICHATSWORTH, Calif., Oct. 25, 2023

value.title: US orders immediate halt to shipping of some AI chips to China, Nvidia says
value.excerpt: Tech giant Nvidia says the US has told it to stop shipping some of its advanced artificial intelligence chips to China immediately. The restrictions were supposed to be introduced 30 days from 17 October.

value.title: GeForce RTX 4090 might not be banned in China as the U.S. immediately halts AI GPU sales
value.excerpt: Updated U.S. restrictions on GPU hardware for AI are now in effect, but the good news for PC gamers in China is that the GeForce RTX 4090 looks to be okay.

value.title: AI chip wars: US curbs Nvidia GPU chip exports sooner than expected
value.excerpt: On Tuesday, chip designer Nvidia announced in an SEC filing that new US export restrictions on its high-end AI GPU chips to China are now in effect sooner than expected, according to a report from Reuters.

value.title: FEDML Nexus AI: The Next-Gen Cloud Services for LLMs and Generative AI
value.excerpt: FEDML, a rapidly growing startup in artificial intelligence (AI), officially announced the release of FEDML Nexus AI, offering the next generation of cloud services and platform for generative AI.This press release features multimedia.
